points.name: ArGraMod
points.label: ArGraMod
points.desc: Indicates if gradients trend toward zero at the edges of the deadband or trend toward zero at the center of the deadband.

points.name: ArGraSag
points.label: ArGraSag
points.desc: The gradient used to increase capacitive dynamic current. A value of 0 indicates no additional reactive current support.

points.name: ArGraSwell
points.label: ArGraSwell
points.desc: The gradient used to increase inductive dynamic current.  A value of 0 indicates no additional reactive current support.

points.name: FilTms
points.label: FilTms
points.desc: The time window used to calculate the moving average voltage.

points.name: DbVMin
points.label: DbVMin
points.desc: The lower delta voltage limit for which negative voltage deviations less than this value no dynamic vars are produced.

points.name: DbVMax
points.label: DbVMax
points.desc: The upper delta voltage limit for which positive voltage deviations less than this value no dynamic current produced.

points.name: BlkZnV
points.label: BlkZnV
points.desc: Block zone voltage which defines a lower voltage boundary below which no dynamic current is produced.

points.name: BlkZnTmms
points.label: BlkZnTmms
points.desc: Block zone time the time before which reactive current support remains active regardless of how low the voltage drops.

points.name: HoldTmms
points.label: HoldTmms
points.desc: Hold time during which reactive current support continues after the average voltage has entered the dead zone.

points.name: VRefPct_SF
points.label: VRefPct_SF
points.desc: Scale factor for the voltage zone and limit settings.
